title: PSVR Blowout and EA Layoffs - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.26.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get your trial set at http://harrys.com/gamesdaily

TheGameFanatics.com's Ben Runnings joins Greg to talk about PlayStation's State of Play, Xbox's ID @ Game Pass, and more layoffs at EA.

Time Stamps - 
00:08:55 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny World Tour comes to Kansas City THIS Saturday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Tom Bock, and Mohammed Mohammed!
The Roper Report   -
00:09:35 - PlayStation State of Play
00:24:41 - “Is it worth investing in PSVR right now though?” - Parker Begale
00:29:09 - “Sony seems to be doubling down on its VR venture…” - Alex Russ
00:34:20 - ID@Xbox Game Pass
00:38:30 - EA Lays off 350 in Marketing, Publishing, and Analytics
00:41:11 - “Why do you think this year has had so many layoffs already?” - Why Not Pete
00:45:23 - Sony Comments on Pulling the Download Codes from Retail
00:46:42 - Global Gaming Citizens Category Open
00:48:17 -  Quip
00:49:37 -  Harry’s
00:50:50 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:54:10 - “I just wanted to know if you think it is possible for Beat Saber to come to Switch.” - Saucy Biscuit
00:55:40 - “Just wanted to give a shout out to The Nano Biologist for gifting me a sub yesterday.” - Msg Heavyarms
00:56:13 - Squad Up: Jimmy - Xbox One - OneArmWonder828 - Apex Legends
00:56:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Tim & Whitta
